title: Fernando Mendoza’s Article Published in a Research Journal

config: Our colleague Alan Fernando Mendoza and his classmates from Computer Systems Engineering at the Technical Institute of Saltillo published an original article, “Detection of Lung Diseases Through Artificial Intelligence and the Internet of Things,” in the World Journal of Engineering Research and Technology (WJERT). WJERT is an international peer-reviewed, online bimonthly research journal for the enhancement of research in various disciplines of Engineering and Technology. Congratulations Fernando! Read the official announcement on the Facebook fan page of the Department of Computer Systems Engineering.
